page.title: 08HARMANSWATER, BRACKNELL.
page.content: The residents of{Harmans Water}like it's open spaces and plentiful play areas. There is a sadness surrounding the{development}of adjacent Crown Estate Land for more housing and busy roads. This neighbourhood is not one of small children. Many are teenagers and young adults living with parents. {Spare time pursuits}tend to be of the homely kind, such as gardening and home improvement. The nearby{shops}are used only for occasional purchases, being 'more expensive' than the supermarkets where a weekly shop is the rule. People tend to travel to{Reading}to buy clothes or other large items. Most locals see themselves living elsewhere later in life, in a coastal or country environment.
